1.content:
Welcome to the start of Equestria Girls: Age Regression.

This is the point where you The Reader gets to choose which character gets to be regressed and how their scenario will be played out. Certain characters will have their own pre-written stories for you to build upon and expand without having to make up your own.
1.title: The Start

11.content: The Main Six students who are in High School are about to be regressed, but which one?
11.title: The Main Six

111.content:
You have chosen Twilight Sparkle.

The new student on the block who is secretly on a mission to recover her crown from Sunset Shimmer with her six new friends. In the new world as a Human she keep her various pony-like traits and she is trying to adapt to her new Human body as her balance is rather unjust and she tends to pick items up using her mouth. Just like her old self.

Choice 1: Aftermath
- It has been two weeks since Twilight recovered the Alicorn Crown and defeated Sunset Shimmer in the Human World. But something is missing, she misses the versions of her friends that she met in the strange world and not to mention the farewell to Flash Sentry. Now she secretly enters the mirror back to the Human World and something happened that she did not expect, she retains her pony form yet she is now turned into the same age of a foal. But luckily, Fluttershy is there to notice what happened.
111.title: Twilight

1111.content:
Today was the day; Thirty long moons had passed since her visit to the human world. With a wistful sigh, Twilight reluctantly admitted to herself hat she missed her human friends. There was an odd, charming quality about her human friends. And even though she interacted with them the exact same way she did with her friends, there was a different feel around them.

Twilight thought to herself about what made them different from her own friends, adding more reasons to her list of why she should at least visit Canterlot High. She thought of the obvious like it's what friends do, and they' were probably missing her a lot more than she was. After all, Twilight has friends just like them, and they don't have her specifically. There was an alleged "twin sister," but Pinkie did say she lived in the city. Plus the fact that their version of Twilight still seemed to be in her antisocial shut-in phase made it less likely of them befriending her easily.

Or maybe it was the fact that she subconsciously missed being a human.

Whatever it the reason was, it was enough to convince her to at least see what they were up to. Just pop in, say hello, stay for a couple of hours, and go back home. She sighed again, taking a deep breath and approaching the magic mirror. "Well, here goes nothing." Bracing herself to be disoriented by the trans-dimensional travelling. Once again she felt herself lose consciousness for a brief minute or so.

Upon waking up, she found herself unable to stand. Her legs buckled every time she tried to stand, and she quickly realized she wasn't bipedal again. Twilight looked at where she expected her hands to appear and was surprised to see small hooves. It didn't take long for her to guess that she was still in pony form.

"Wha- what happened? Why am I so sma-- Why's my voice like this!?" Twilight quickly fell backwards and brought her fore hooves up to her mout, finding it hard to believe that her voice was that high pitched and undeveloped. Her breath quickly sped up, resulting in short, jagged intakes of air that only made her feel worse.

Countless fears and speculations made themselves apparent. What if someone sees me, what if I'm stuck like this forever, and many other "what-ifs" entered her mind, each psyching her out more than the last.

Finally, when her anxiety reached a boiling point, a soft, soothing voice called from nearby. "Are you okay, little fella?" Twilight, both petrified and curious, turned to face whoever spoke to her and was relieved to see a familiar face. "Aww, Applejack never told me her horse had a foal. You're a long way from Sweet Apple Acres."
"Oh, Fluttershy, I'm glad you-- wait, what are you doing?" As if Fluttershy ignored Twilight's attempts to communicate, she grabbed the tiny pony and cradled her up to her chest.

Fluttershy examined the small creature in front of her, its lavender coat, purple eyes, and hair reminding her of Twilight. The human girls gasped slightly and stepped back, noticing both the horn atop its head and the wings on its sides. "Wings and a horn? What the? You're not from around here, are you?" Fluttershy glanced towards the school's statue, remembering how Twilight Sparkle came and went to their universe. Quickly piecing the small details together, leaving her to ask, "Twilight, is that you?"
1111.title: Aftermath

11111.content:
"Yes it's me,Fluttershy." Replied Twilight. Fluttershy asked "How did this happen?" Twilight said "I don't really know, when I returned it just appeared to have happened." Futtershy stroked Twilight while trying to think of a plan, she was wondering wheather to ask someone for advice or take care of Twilight herself.
What does she do?

But I shouldn't just care for her on my own, but she's so cute and little. I don't want to share her with anyone else. And I can't just reveal a pegacorn-thingy to everyone. Think, Fluttershy, think. "Are you sure Twilight? I mean, I could just hide you in my backpack, i-if that's alright with you," Fluttershy tried to reason with the tiny alicorn, but Twilight was resilient and refused. "No. Although education is important to me, I'd rather go home instead. I don't really wanna be seen like this," She coyly nestled into the crook of the teenaged girl's arms.

"Alright then." Fluttershy gave a tiny smile. "If that's what you want, then so be it." She began to walk out of the highschool, taking a slight detour towards the friendly-looking suburban neighborhood with it's welcoming appeal.

As Fluttershy reached her house, she felt a warmth settle around her torso. When she looked down, Twilight was fast asleep, but the little filly had accidentally peed all over her shirt.

What does Fluttershy do?

114.content:
Hey, you've chosen the incredibly bubbly, excitable, and party-crazed girl. Now, like every other character, I'm going to pitch some scenarios.

Choice 1. Arrested Developments: Pinkie Pie finds herself acting immature, well more than usual. And as her teacher calls her to the front of the class, Pinkie notices that she is a lot shorter than her classmates. Playfully teased as she makes her way to the front of the class and getting shorter along the way, finally she gets to the front as a whimpering toddler with her five concerned friends rushing her to the hospital afterwards.

Choice 2. Just Desserts: Do I need to explain? Okay, fine. Twilight, experimenting with both science and magic, creates an abomination love-child between the two mediums that should not coincide, birthing the scientifically-magical cupcake with unknown-side effects. And with Pinkie Pie being Pinkie Pie, she eats the snack without hesitation or even knowing what it is. Considering the fact that this is an age regression interactive, we, as the audience and omnipotent writers, know the results beforehand.
114.title: Pinkie Pie

A diaper!

The view given showed little she hadn't already seen.

Sunset walked straight up to Pinkie, a nervous smile evident on her face.

She gained an angered tone, "I think I know the reason behind all this."

Pinkie raised an eyebrow, indicating for her currently-older friend to keep speaking.

Pinkie was so amazed she fell onto her diaper.

Then, came up with a plan for a cure, "I don't know how they can still posses magic, but they must be the source of your...new age. I'll have someone follow them. Probably Rainbow and Applejack. They're the two to call when force is the need."

And, before picking Pinkie up, Sunset announced happily, "Until then, you'll be staying with me! I have your leave papers signed, so we're good to go. And, don't worry. I have an idea as to how we can get you baby supplies. Remember I also know magic."

1142.content:
Twilight Sparkle, the human one not the princess, groaned sleepily head resting in her hands as she sat in her “laboratory” which was actually her houses kitchen.

Two months. She muttered. Two months of planning, research, and trial and what do I have to show for it? The girl muttered angel lifting her head to glare at the object before her.

For the last two months the girl had been trying to combine science and magic. Her last few attempts blew up in her face so Sunset Shimmer had suggested something smaller, and a helping hand. Two months later the fruits of her labor were before her, and they were disappointing.

It was a cupcake. A result of a combination of magic and science, the culmination of her research into the concept of magic. And it was a cupcake.

To say that it was a regular cupcake would be an insult to the rainbow iced sparkling treat. It was just, perfect. There was no other way to describe the rainbow colored treat. Perfect looks, perfect texture, even the perfect smell! Twilight could even swear there was singing as she looked at it.

Any other day Twilight would have been drooling at the sight of the treat. Today though, she was to tired and angry to be affected by the magical treat so settled for glaring at it.

The girl muttered something and ran a hand through her tussled hair. Sleepless nights, missed showers, and explosions for a cupcake. She said glaring at the offending pastry. A rapid series of knocks interrupted her thoughts and the door was thrown open.

Twilight! A perky cheerful voice called as Pinkie came skipping in. I hadn’t seen you and a few days and. Oh my gosh! Twilight! Are you ok? Pinkie gasps before suddenly appearing next to her friend.

Twilight adjusted her glassed with a frown. She really, really, wasn’t in the mood for Pinkies antics today.

I’m fine Pinkie, just disappointed in a failed experiment. She explained.

Pinkie gave her a look. Twilight. When was the last time you bathed? Or ate? The violet haired girl made to answer, then froze when she couldn’t’ actually remember. Ummmmm. And at that moment her stomach growled making her blush.

That’s it! You’ve been cooped up in her for too long! Pinkie declared. Its time for a break! But Twilight protested only to have Pinkie start pushing her out.

No buts missy. You get cleaned up and we’re going to Sugercube Corner! My treat. The other girls will meet us there!

But. Get going I’ll be right her. Pinkie said giving a too wide smile. Realizing she was defeated Twilight complied and went to go get cleaned up.

She resisted the urge to scream when she saw her own reflection. “Maybe I can use a break.” She thought as she tried to make herself presentable.

Meanwhile downstairs Pinkie had gotten bored and had noticed the cupcake on the table. Her eyes were immediately drawn to it and her mouth watered. She had to have it!

Pinkie didn’t just tackle it and start tearing into it, no. She paused at first knowing it wasn’t hers. But after a moment she managed to convince herself that Twilight wouldn’t miss one cupcake and snatched it, savoring the treat.

It was perfect!

At that moment Twilight came down. Ok I’m ready now annaaaaaaahhhhhh! Pinkie!
Tes? The pink teen said swallowing the last mouthful.

That was my experiment! Twilight yelled panicking! That cupcake was the result of mixing science and magic!

Really? Well can you make another? It was really gooood! The pink teen said giving a small bounce. Pinkie this is serious. Twilight argued panicking. It’s still untested and uncontrolled! I don’t even know how exactly I made it or what it would do! Who knows what will happen now that you ate it! Twilight screamed concerned for her friend.

At that moment pinkie felt her stomach rumble. There was a pause, the world holding its breath as both teens looked frightened. And then Pinkie hiccupped. A bit of glitter puffed out of her mouth but nothing happened. Humm. Cherry. Pinkie declared tasting her lips.

Twilight groaned and face palmed as Pinkie continued to hiccup giggling with each one. Leave it to Pinkie to eat a magic cupcake and only get hiccups. Twilight muttered rubbing her temples.

Well since I’m not *hic* going to go boomy! *hic* Can we go*hic* to Sugercube*hic* Corner now? Pinkie asked between hiccups. Twilight sighed and nodded deciding she was far too tired to try to analyze Pinkie’s pinkieness today.

Does Twilight notice something strange with Pinkie as they leave?

1151.content:
Alright, so you've chosen the lovely and oh-so-elegant Rarity. Now, just how is she regressed?

Choice 1#: Diapers are the New Trend - Rarity awakes one morning to find herself inside a crib with Pinkie Pie and Fluttershy to take care of her. But this is all-too-subtly planned out...what is going on here?

Choice. 2#: Fashioneisaster - Rarity has been acting awfully strange lately. And is her reduced height noticeable? Can her friends help her before she regresses too far?
1151.title: Rarity

11511.content:
Rarity's eyes slowly fluttered open, only to be blinded by the hot rays of sunlight. She lifted a hand to blot out the evil beams of light until she managed to sit up. Disoriented for only a moment, Rarity stretched her arms and legs gracefully, emitting a delicate yawn. She felt invigorated and ready to face the day. Rarity tried to step off of her bed.

...Only to discover she couldn't! Her eyes sprang wide open and she was now fully awake. Rarity looked at her surroundings and immediately realized the environment she was in was definitely not her room. It was...a baby nursery?

As she inspected farther, Rarity could faintly make out a whole nursery through the large, white wooden bars of the...crib? She was in a crib? Rarity looked around some more and was stunned and frightened at what she saw next.

The room appeared to have been freshly wallpapered with a white paper with vertical pink stripes, intertwined with a delicate, green tinted flowering vine. The room was filled with baby furniture in white enamel; next to the window there was a rocking chair and adjacent to it was a matching changing table.

Underneath the changing table were several baskets, filled to the brim with diapers, lotions, powders, oils, and many other infant care products. There was even a small baby bathtub that was padded so when the baby was bathed, they wouldn't bruise themselves during the bath.

A dresser stood by the opposite wall and had an acrylic apothecary jar full of pacifiers and a small nursery lamp on top. The entire room had a bunny motif; adorable pictures of baby bunnies seemed to be everywhere.

The lamp, the curtains, and even the crib sheets had bunnies on them. There were three framed color prints of bunnies descending in a diagonal across one of the walls. Rarity always adored bunnies and there they were.

Looking more closer with a keen eye, Rarity noticed that the mobile hanging over the end of the crib above her had bunnies hanging from it's wires and a diaper stacker now hung from the crib with a bunny applique. The tall yellow diaper pail next to the changing table had a pattern of a group of baby rabbits romping joyfully in a patch of grass.

The whole roomed looked as if someone had spent weeks working on a nursery just for her. Just as things couldn't get any worse, Rarity heard a ginger crinkling sound from beneath her as she moved, almost like a cackling fireplace or crumpling paper.

Rarity looked down at herself and noticed that she was clothed in a fuzzy blue baby sleeper with mittens on her hands. She felt the top of her head and was instantly aware that she was indeed wearing a frilly bonnet to match her current attire.

But what got her attention the most was the pacifier that was in her mouth. A dark blue pacifier, she could easily make out. This horrified Rarity to no end to the point where she let out a shriek so loud it could have been mistaken for a scream.

That's when the nursery door flung open. Rarity tearfully jerked her head to see who was entering at the moment and would have spit the pacifier out of her mouth had her mouth not been sucking on it so hard for reassurance. Rarity was mortified to see the new visitor.

The figure said in a cheerful voice, "Good morning, little Rar-Rar! Did you have a nice nap?" The figure lifted Rarity up from under her forearms and held her to face level, rubbing it's nose to Rarity's and mushing her cheeks together. Rarity gulped as she saw....
11511.title: An Odd Start to the Day

choices: To see some of there other friends or a playdate
1151111.content:
“Pinkie! What’s going on? Why are you here? Why am I a baby!?!” Rarity cried her pacifier dropping in shock. Or tried to anyway. Rarity’s eyes widened in horror as she realized she could no longer talk. Only a stream of incomprehensible baby babble escaped from her mouth, along with a bit of drool. Rarity was mortified as it slid down her chin and dripped on her outfit.

Pinkie giggled and wiped the mess from her chin. “And good morning to you too Rar-rar!” The pink hared girl cooed as if nothing was wrong. “What? No Pinkie please! Listen to me.” Rarity babbled and gurgled some more as she wiggled trying to make her friend understand.

Instead Rarity suddenly yelped in shock as Pinkie flipped her over, undid part of her sleeper and Rarity experienced her first diaper check in years. “Uh-oh! Did wittle Rar-rar make a diddy?” Pinkie cooed flipping Rarity around again and holding her up. “I think she did! Yes, she did! A certain baby girl needs her diapee changed!” Pinkie cooed.

Unfortunately, Pinkie was right and Rarity cringed as she was carried over to the changing table. The diaper squished wetly against her, swollen the wetness indicator long since discolored hinting at the nights worth of accidents locked in its padding. “How could I not notice?” Rarity thought dismayed that she never even noticed the state of her diaper until pinkie had pointed it out to her.

Her musings were interrupted as Pinkie suddenly whisked her clothing away leaving her in nothing but a diaper. “Lets get you changed!” Pinkie said happily already gathering up the supplies and moving to undo the tapes.

Rarity panicked. “No! Pinkie! Listen to me! I’ve been changed into a baby! Can’t you see that! Help me!” All that escaped her mouth though and all Pinkie heard was another stream of baby babble making the girl giggle.

“Your so silly Rarity.!” Pinkie cooed poking her in the stomach, an act that made Rarity giggle much to her shock. “I’ll have this nasty diaper off of you in no time!” Rarity gurgled, kicking her legs and squirming for all she was worth to stop Pinkie but nothing she did worked.

Pinkie just placed a hand over her stomach, easily holding her down as she removed the wet padding with the other. As it was removed Rarity felt embarrassed, ashamed, utterly confused, and maybe even violated. It was too much for Rarity and she soon found herself crying like the infant she was.

Pinkie didn’t notice though, merely fixing the smile on her face, lifting the baby’s ankles with a hand and proceeded to clean her change with a wipe. This made Rarity start to cry harder, truly bawling. Pinkie finished and without hesitation grabbed a pacifier from the jar and shoved it into the baby’s mouth.

Rarity’s cries were abruptly silenced by the foreign object. Instantly her body began to suckle the rubber nub and Rarity slumped in defeat. Rarity nurced her pacifier noisly as pinkie quickly finished the process, sprinkling her with baby powder and taping the new diaper closed.

“There we go! All done!” Pinkie cooed patting her diapered rear. “Now what should you wear, well I guess since you already have the pacifier.” Rarity once again found herself helpless as her friend proceeded to wrangle her into an outfit. When she finished Pinkie took a moment to admire her handywork and Rarity got a look at what she was wearing.

She was now wearing a frilly pink and white onesie, which did nothing to hide her diaper. Pinkie had also dressed her in matching socks and mittens and yet another matching bonnet was tied to her head as she nursed on her pink pacifier. In all Rarity was not the perfect image of a darling baby girl, and she hated it.

Seeming to not notice Rarity’s distress Pinkie picked the baby up and set her on her hip as she walked out of the nursery. Rarity could only wonder where she was being carried.
1151111.title: Pinkie Pie

choices: Applebloom and Scootaloo stop by for a visit.
Rarity is taken to the kitchen for some breakfast.
115112.content:
"S-Sweetie Belle?!" Rarity exclaimed. She was absolutely horrified to discover she could no longer talk! A string of incomprehensible babbling emerged from Rarity's mouth, as well as a thin line of drool. It coursed down her chin, only to fall wetly onto her bib.

"Awww, did Rar-Rar make a little diddy in her dydee? I think she did! C'mon, let's get you cleaned up. Mom and Dad left me in charge of you for the day until they finish their errands." Sweetie Belle said in a sing-song voice as she settled Rarity on her hip while she walked towards the changing table.

Sweetie was right; Rarity did have a very wet diaper on. Rarity cringed as the sopping diaper squished up against her private loins. Her diaper drooped heavily in front of her and the translucent wetness indicator on the front of the diaper had a faded yellow stain beneath the thick padding, hinting at the night's production of baby pee it held locked in its absorbent padding.

Sweetie Belle gently laid Rarity onto the changing pad and began to untape the diaper. Rarity panicked, "Sweetie Belle, you have got to listen to me! I've been changed into an infant! Can't you see?!" Much to her dismay, all Sweetie heard was another melody of incoherent baby blather.

Sweetie Belle smiled as she poked her "little" sister in the stomach, "You're so silly, Rar-Rar! And such a sweet little baby. Don't worry little sis, Big Sis will get this nasty diaper off of you in no time!"

Rarity felt offended, violated, and extremely embarrassed all at once. The soggy diaper that was wrapped around her waist showed the extreme impropriety and incontinence that made her seem like the infant she truly was. Because of this, Rarity began to cry in earnest.

Instead of reacting, Sweetie Belle merely smiled and continued to dispose of the old diaper. Meanwhile, Rarity was bawling, less gracefully than she would under normal circumstances. This was too much for the poor girl to handle!

With her sister's mouth wide open, Sweetie seized this opportunity to grab a pacifier from the acrylic apothecary jar sitting close by. As soon as it all started, Rarity's sobs were abruptly silenced by the foreign object in her mouth. With her mouth filled with the soft latex of the rubber teat, Rarity began to suckle in defeat.
115112.title: Sweetie Belle

choices: The nursery to get dressed. They are going out.
1151122.content:
With her “little” sister quiet Sweetie Bell was able to easily complete the diapering process. The whole time she couldn’t stop cooing at how cute little Rarity was, constantly playing with her sisters chubby stomach and tiny toes.

For her part Rarity found herself enjoying the attention, much to her dismay, and she couldn’t help but to squirm and squeal childishly as Sweetie played with her. That done Sweetie picked her sister up again and carried her out of the nursery.

Rarity only had a moment to wonder what was going on before she found herself strapped into a highchair. “Breakfast time!” Sweetie sang tying a bib around her sisters’ neck. Rarity felt her stomach drop. Not only dd she somehow become a baby and had her diaper changed but now she was sitting in a highchair in nothing but a diaper and bib waiting for her formerly younger sister to feed her!

Rarity felt her head spin as she tried to process everything, but Sweetie Bell was already back removing her pacifier and holding a bowel of, something. “Open wide here comes the Choo-choo!” Sweetie cooed holding a spoonful of the goop up at Rarity.

Maybe she was still in shock but instead of fighting Rarity opened her tiny almost toothless mouth at her sisters’ request. Three things shocked Rarity as Sweetie shoved the spoon into her mouth.

One: why had she done that?

Two: that whatever Sweetie was feeding her was good. Really, good.

Three: She was suddenly very, very hungry!

Babbling for more Rarity reached out to the bowel, making her sister giggle and scoop up another spoonful. At the moment Rarity didn’t care how childish she looked as she swallowed every spoonful, bits and pieces sticking to her face and falling onto her bib. She just wanted to be full!

It was only after Sweetie had cleaned her face that Rarity realized what had happened and her embarrassment returned as Sweetie offered her a bottle. The thought of drinking from a bottle disgusted Rarity to no end, but like before a powerful thirst gripped her and she soon had no choice but to start nursing the bottle. Seeing her sister was occupied Sweetie went to get her own food. Soon Rarity was done, letting the bottle fall onto the chairs tray as she waited for Sweetie to finish her food.

There wasn’t much to do except bounce in her chair, kick her legs, and nurse on her pacifier after Sweetie gave it back to her. This finally gave Rarity time to think and process what had happened to her, but all her question still came up with no answers.

Why was she a baby? She was pretty sure she went to be as a teen in high school so what happened? Not having answers made her kick and beat her tiny fists against the tray in frustration. Rarity was only vaguely aware of how childish she was acting.

After a few minutes Sweetie finished, picked her sister up again and Rarity found herself carried to

12111.content:
A few hours later, Twilight and her new child were inside a guest room for only this night.

Currently, Twilight had decided to freshen up from her latest adventure before the party with a quick bath while Cadance kept an eye on little Sunsetty.

Cadance giggled as Sunset tried to walk to her. She held her hooves out, "Come on, sweetie. Auntie Cadance is here to catch you."

Sunset failed at moving after four steps, to trip painlessly into her aunt's hooves. Cadance embraced the foal, pleased to hear little squeals of delight from the baby. All of a sudden, she felt a painful tug on her hair, "Ow!"

Setting the child on the ground...after gently pulling her off the mane, Cadance said to her with a tad bit authority, "No, no, cutie. My hair isn't a playtoy, okay?"

Sunset apparently understood, starting to cry. Cadance felt guilty for causing the sobs, putting Sunset on her shoulder to pat the foal into calmness.

...

"Ow!"

Cadance held the foal to her eyes, irritated now, "Okay, I'm not having a lot of fun with the pranks you're pulling, child. Those tears were fake, huh?!"

Sunset gave a flash of an evil grin.

Cadance was seriously surprised, "What in the hay?! Hey, you are still all there in the mind, aren't you?!"

Sunset tilted her head to showcase confusion. Afterwards, her own hoof found its way into her mouth, being sucked on by a seemingly-innocent face.

Cadance raised an eyebrow, "Really? As if I would fall for that trick, missy. Well, I guess it's fine."

She cooed at the little one before saying more, "I mean, what could you possibly do now, hhmmm? Stuck in that small helpless baby body, completely dependent on your very own enemies for everything! Too bad that Twilight's your new mommy, I bet! No crown for you, sweetheart. How's about a new diaper, instead?! Seeing as how you've just went in your current one."

Sunset had began to grit her teeth with every backhoof to her own ego...

Then, she heard the last few sentences of Cadance's mockery, and glanced down at the diaper hanging from herself, thoroughly soiled. She, for real this time, couldn't keep the tears from flowing down her face.

Cadance felt a bit of regret for making fun of the tiny villian...then remembered this was still a evil pony on the inside.

She poked the diaper, "Whoa! Somepony's really soaked their dia-dee! But, I shouldn't change you until you've got a full load. No point in wasting a perfectly good diaper!"

Sunset whimpered, from the urine cooling and her own fear of the mare holding her. She didn't want to go potty anymore than she already had, so held her hooves out. Sunset hoped Cadance was stupid enough to fall for the adorable eyes she was utilizing to get her way.

Sunset was now resting on the shoulder of the expert babysitter, smiling out of sight at how easily the adult could be fooled.

Cadance patted the foal's diaper, saying sweetly, "I'm waiting, Sunset. No diaper change until it's ab-sol-utely necessary."

Sunset would've told the mare, if she could still talk, to go buck herself. With a swallowing of pride, she began to grunt with effort.

When nothing was accomplished, she turned to cry deeply on the mare's shoulder, hating the disgusting wetness of the diaper, along with Cadance.

After her river of pony-made droplets all departed, she sighed, trying it out again.

This time, she could feel the lumps of crap land silently, expanding the diaper out noticeably.

Cadance cruelly pressed on the back of the full diaper, just to upset Sunset, "You do need a change, huh?!"

Sunset held her dams of eye water back, not giving the bitch the satisfaction. She would so make this particular Alicorn pay for such horrible embarrassment...whenever she regained her former adult body.

Cadance finally decided to walk over to the changing table, laying the child down softly onto it.

She got out all the supplies, and got to work.

Undoing the tapes, she then grabbed the foal's back hooves in her magic grasp, lifting them up with care. Then, teleported the diaper into a nearby trashcan. Next, wiped the messes off the foal, saying all the while, "Who's a messy foal?! Sunset is! Yes she is! I'll need to tell your mommy about how you just lo-ve to stay in a dirty diaper! Does wittle Sunsetty wike that?! If not, who cares?!"

Oh, how Sunset hated Cadance for what she was planning on saying!

After her area was clean, a brand-new, clean diaper was introduced to the foal's bum swiftly.

Within minutes next, Sunset was on the carpet, just in a glaring contest with her new aunt, even if the adult had just changed her diaper.

Twilight got out of the tub, toweled off, and went into the room all sparkly clean for the party.

She saw her sister-in-law shake a rattle in her new child's face, laughing while she did it. Cadance said to Twilight as she shook the baby's toy in front of the most annoyed foal right now, "She is just a little cranky from not enough sleep. We should get her to bed now. As in right now! I must speak with you about something."
