This was gob-smacking to say the least for her. She instantly squirmed into Twilight's arms and looked at the floor where the play mat had been set down and was ready to play.

"Ooh. Looks like someone wants to play with the Twins." Cup Cake giggled at the sight of Sunset reaching out. She lowered her two babies onto the floor where the play mat was and they started to play with the toys around them. Making lots of gurgling and gibberish the second they got their little hands on the toys.

Sunset was being lowered down and she was put onto the mat opposite to where the twins were sitting down. For a moment she crawled up to them slowly and kept a smile on her face, both twins stopped for a moment and looked at Sunset who was coming their way. They both looked at each other for a second and then...
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.title: The playdate begins!

choices: Sunset begins to play with Pound and Pumpkin becomes jealous.
Sunset doesn't want to play anymore; her maturity comes flooding back to her.
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.content: Seeing this as an opportunity to make a new friend, Pound Cake made his way over to Sunset with a smile, leaving a trail of drool behind him as he went. Pound plopped down next to Sunset and loosed a coo, happily waving at the new nursery occupant.
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.title: Pound Cake crawls over to play with Sunset

choices: No time for a plan. The adults have come back to check on the babies.
Somebody will be getting a time-out, and it won't be Pound or Pumpkin!
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.content:
Leaving Sunset to process the new friend in front of her, Pound Cake slowly grabbed a small toy truck and began to roll it across the floor, gurgling happily as if to mimic a truck noise.

Sunset crept up close to Pound Cake and rolled a soft sculpture alphabet block in front of his moving truck to simulate a collision. Pound Cake hit the rolling block with the front of his truck and flashed her a quick smile of comradeship and love.

She giggled in return and rolled another block at his truck from further out. Pound ran his truck out to hit the block and almost missed it. His coordination was off and he had difficulty timing the truck's movement to the block's wildly careening tumble.

Sunset launched another block and the game was on. Pound hit two, then miss one completely before he got on his hands and knees and got serious about the game.

Sunset knelt on the opposite side of the floor and launched block after block at his truck. Soon the two of them were laughing and giggling uproariously over the toys scattered in front of them.

The adults that towered over them smiled in satisfaction when Mrs. Cake spoke up, "Well dearie, why don't we have some tea and buttercups and leave the little ones to play?" Twilight nodded and followed Mrs. Cake out of the nursery, firmly locking the door shut to make sure the babies wouldn't attempt to crawl out.

While watching the two play from a short distance, Pumpkin Cake pouted. Her brother and her were so close, they were almost inseparable, and now another playmate comes into their lives and swoops him away from her! How dare this Sunset Shimmer do this to her!

Pumpkin Cake frowned when her brother and Sunset rolled around on the floor together, giggling vigorously as their imagined roleplay got sillier and sillier between each thought. She was going to fix this, and Sunset would pay, one way or a another.
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.title: Sunset begins to play with Pound and Pumpkin be...

choices: Pumpkin exits to find Pinkie Pie in the hallway.
Pumpkin exits to find herself at the top of the stairs.
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.content:
Pumpkin wasn't having a moment of this petty nonsense, this awful new baby stole her brother away from her and this time, she'll pay for it. She began to get on her knees and hands to crawl over to the two babies who were still playing with the block and the other toys scattered around the nursery. This was it, time to make the new baby pay for her selfish actions.

But before Pumpkin could even get to the other side of the nursery, she suddenly heard the lock on the door turn. This caused the babies in the room to stop what they were doing and focus their attention onto the big door opening.

The door swung wide open to reveal Mrs. Cake standing in the frame with a nice smile on her face.

"Alright, my babies!" Cupcake sang. "Time for some num nums!"

The promise of food seemed to excite all of them, even Pumpkin, who took revenge as a higher priority. But she quickly made her mind up and thought she could do with the extra mac 'n cheese to give her strength when she teaches that evil Sunset Shimmer a lesson she won't forget.

Mrs. Cake slowly walked over to Pound and Sunset and leaned down to pick both of them up into her arms. This, just like before, infuriated Pumpkin who crossed her arms and pouted at the awful sight. She was the one who was supposed to be next to her brother, not this other baby. Cupcake kept a firm grip on both Sunset and Pound whilst they kept a one toy each in their possession, unable to get over the excitement they had beforehand with the blocks and cars.

"I'm so sorry honey-bunny." Cupcake looked down and spoke to Pumpkin. "I can't hold all of you, I'm afraid."

Pumpkin felt rather betrayed. Was she going to be left all alone while Pound and Sunset where going to eat all the food? She knew that her brother liked to wolf down the first edible thing in front of him, but this was ridiculous! While the toddler didn't cry at the news, Pumpkin still felt very incredibly upset.

"Pumpkin, dear. I'm going to take Pound and little Sunny here downstairs into the kitchen. I'll be back in a tick to get you!" Cupcake continued to sing. She walked out of the nursery with the two babies in hand while they happily gurgled and made unintelligible noises together.

Pumpkin sat there in the nursery all alone surrounded by just the toys and baby supplies she and her brother shared, she quickly started to crawl over to the doorway and left the room in search for her brother and the nasty baby.
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.title: No time for a plan. The adults have come back!

choices: took her downstairs to Mrs. Cake.
puts her back inside the nursery.
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.content:
Desperately crawling down the upper hallway she quickly left the nursery and began to crawl on her little adventure to find her missing brother and that wicked Sunset Shimmer. But there was one problem, the layout of the house soon got the best of her, while she's lived here for months she couldn't understand the strangeness of the walls and the other doors. This didn't look anything like her nursery or the back garden at all, it made no sense to her.

Usually she wouldn't be making her way down these strange halls and into the unknown territory but she had to find her brother in a bid to save him. But it was no use, she couldn't find him and her energy soon dropped to the bottom.

But before Pumpkin Cake could even move on she felt something tug at her stomach and quickly pull her up into the air. She panicked at first and then saw a pair of giant pink hands wrap round her stomach.

It was Pinkie Pie! She was saved!

"What are you doing outside of the nursery!" Pinkie Pie playfully asked the baby. She bounced Pumpkin up and down before holding her close to her chest. "Did you escape the nursery?" She spoke in a babyish tone of voice.

Pumpkin tried replying back to the teenager about what was going on, Sunset, Pound and the sweet delicious num nums but all that came out was the same old baby talk that Pinkie has heard before.

Pinkie Pie then...
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.title: Pumpkin exits to find Pinkie Pie in the hallway.

choices: Pinkie declines, she has some school work to do.
Pinkie accepts, she'd love to help feed the babies.
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.content:
"Are you supposed to be with Pound and Sunset?" Pinkie Pie slowly walked down the stairs with Pumpkin Cake in hand and dug her fingers though Pound's soft hair. She hummed a soft tune to herself which unintentionally calmed Pumpkin down, no longer did she struggle in her arms but allowed her to keep her tight so that they could keep on the lookout for her brother. The extra view was a bonus to her.

As Pinkie Pie reached the bottom of the stairs she noticed Cup Cake leaving the kitchen who in turn noticed Pinkie.

"Oh." Cup Cake paused, then proceeded to smile at Pinkie Pie. "You brought down Pumpkin. I was just about to go upstairs and bring her down for some delicious mac and cheese." Cup Cake extended her arms and softly grabbed Pumpkin and took her from Pinkie to hold in her own arms. Pumpkin was relieved to her mother and she stared up at the adult and gave a little smile she couldn't but drool at the same time.

"I found her outside the nursery." Pinkie Pie as she began to ascend back upstairs. "She's a little stinker. I think she escaped her crib."

"No." Cup Cake shook her head. "I think I left the door open again."

"Silly Cup Cake." Pinkie laughed.

"Yes." Cup Cake smiled at the teenager. "I took Pound and Sunset into the kitchen for some num nums and I must have left the door open enough for her to escape."

Pumpkin didn't mind the two as they spoke. She took this moment to look for Pound and Sunset, she looked over Cup Cake's shoulder and noticed the kitchen door was open a spell. With the door open slightly she saw Pound and Sunset both sitting in high chairs. Pound was stationed inside his own cream coloured high chair with a little pillow behind him to support his back and Sunset...

She couldn't see her. But she couldn't definitely hear her laughing and making loud noises.

"Well, actually. Do you think you could help me for a moment, Pinkie? I just need someone to hold Pumpkin while I feed Sunset and Pound. I can't' let Pumpkin roam the kitchen unattended.
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.title: took her downstairs to Mrs. Cake.

choices: She dumped the mac and cheese on her forehead too.
She throws the food off the high chair.
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.content:
Sunset Shimmer couldn't help but laugh at the sight of him, in all these years in this world she had never seen a baby so funny and upbeat before. Her sides were starting to hurt from all the laughing and giggling she had been doing she leaned up against the plastic tray that stopped her from climbing out of the high chair and tried to suppress her giggling, but it was no use. Tears began to form around her eyes as the happiness and laughter continued on for what felt like an eternity.

"Oh no, oh no." Twilight Sparkle panicked. She stood in front of Pound's high chair with a few towels in hand and applied them to Pound's face, arms and now-ruined onesie. Twilight noticed the laughter coming from her baby girl and looked at Sunset with a slight glare. "I'm glad you think this is funny. Now what'll I do when Mrs. Cake finds out her baby boy is covered in mac and cheese!"

"What about mac and cheese?" Said a voice.

Twilight stopped what she was doing and turned round to see Pinkie Pie, standing in the doorway with a large smile on her face.

"Since when did you get here?" Twilight put the towels on the high chair's plastic tray, unknowingly allowing Pound to pick up the mac and cheese covered towels and throw them off the side causing a light splat on the floor. Causing Sunset Shimmer to continue giggling. "And where is Mrs. Cake?"

"Cup Cake had to go back to the nursery with Pumpkin. I'm going to help you feed the babies." Pinkie Pie jumped up into the kitchen and walked over to the two babies. She looked over to see how Sunset was doing and noticed that she hadn't touched the bowl of mac and cheese that Cup Cake put down for them. "Oh wow wee!" Pinkie Pie excitedly yelled.

"What?" Twilight asked.

"Sunset Shimmer hasn't touched her mac and cheese!" Pinkie Pie leaned over the baby girl and patted her on the head.

"I know. I think Sunset wants me to feed her. Mrs. Cake did start to feed her but she got a little fussy and I assumed she wanted me to do it." Twilight moved beside Pinkie Pie and picked up the plastic spoon and proceeded to continue where Mrs. Cake left off with feeding Sunset.

"Aaaaaand!" Pinkie Pie slowly turned to see... Pound Cake with a bowlful of mac and cheese resting on his forehead, splattered down his face, arms and his nice light brown onesie. "We have Pound Cake." She deviously smiled.

"Duba-aba!" Pound loudly proclaimed, as spittle and chunks of cheese began flying out of his mouth and onto his barely recognizable bib.

"You have!" Pinkie Pie responded back, just as loud as Pound Cake. She leaned forward and took a good look at the baby. "Tsk. Tsk. Pound Cake!" Pinkie wiggled her finger at him.

Pound spat out his tongue in return.

Sunset looked at Pound and at Pinkie, who both stuck their tongues out at each other and had an idea. If Pound Cake was having fun with his grown up, then why couldn't she do the same with Twilight?
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.title: Pinkie accepts, she'd love to help.

choices: Sunset Shimmer is taken for a bath.
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.content:
"Now be a good girl and open wide for Twilight!" Twilight Sparkle sang to Sunset Shimmer. She lowered the spoonful of warm mac and cheese to Sunset's mouth and she began to open wide for the delicious food. Twilight dumped the food into the babies mouth and watched her chew and swallow it down the hatch like a good little girl.

But that wasn't about to last for long. Sunset felt the nice taste of cheese and macaroni slide down her throat and she slowly licked her lips, to show affection she clapped her hands together and made incoherent babbling noises to Twilight. Despite the fact that she got a little bit of food on her bib, but that wasn't going to matter soon.

"You're such a good little girl Sunny!" Twilight also decided to clap in response for the good behaviour. "You've still got a little bit left to go and then you can have a nice big bottle." She dipped the spoon into the bowl and got a decent amount of food for her little baby to chew on, she craned the spoon over to Sunset until she felt something tap on her back.

Twilight put the spoon back into the bowl and turned round to see Pinkie Pie covered in the leftover food that Pound Cake had to eat. Small pieces of macaroni lay dormant in her torn apart hair while the melted cheese dripped down her bright pink clothes and onto the floor. Twilight looked shocked at the sight of her friend being covered in so much food.

"What happened!?" Twilight looked at Pinkie's feet and slowly worked her way up with eyes wide open to take in the fact that she was splattered with food all over.

Pinkie Pie opened her mouth to begin speaking but was interrupted by the sounds of Sunset's laughing and giggling who, slammed her hands onto the plastic tray and leaned back into the pillow behind her. Pinkie looked at herself and her clothes and giggled, she took a small dab of cheese that dangled from her skirt and placed it on Twilight's nose.

"Tee hee." Pinkie Pie smiled, she also crossed her arms. "I'm going to change out of my clothes and into something more comfortable." The pink teenager began to walk towards the kitchen doorway but she was stopped by Twilight after taking a few steps.

"Wait." Twilight grabbed Pinkie Pie by the arm, slightly cringing as her hand became covered in food. "What about the babies? I can handle Sunset on my own but I don't know if I can feed Pound Cake."

"Oh silly." Pinkie picked off a few pieces of macaroni from her white shirt and put them in her mouth and began to chew on them. Twilight frowned at the sight. "You'll do fine." Pinkie leaned closer to Twilight who in turn tried to lean away from her dirty friend. "Watch out for Pound, he's a sneaky baby." Pinkie whispered.

"Uh yeah... Sure." Twilight nodded.

With the two grown ups talking to each other both Sunset Shimmer and Pound Cake looked at each other from over their high chairs. Sunset noticed that Pound was still covered in oodles of mac and cheese from earlier and he now suckled his thumb. He took it out for a split second and waved his drool covered hand at her. He then looked at Sunset's bowlful of food and then looked back at Sunset with a smile on his face.

Pound spoke a bunch of gibberish towards Sunset and pointed at the bowl.

Sunset blinked. Did he just talk to her? Or was she seeing things? But that wasn't the least bit important. Her questioning and reasoning quickly took back seat into the recesses of her mind while she thought about the situation that Pound was in.

Sunset started to put two and two together and noticed a few things that happened in the last few minutes. Pinkie Pie seemed to be very happy when Pound placed the bowl on his head. She giggled, laughed and stuck her tongue out at him and kept on playing with him even though she got really dirty. Twilight on the other hand didn't play as much, she used the spoon as an aeroplane just once and that was it

Drool escaped her mouth as her body did the rest of her thinking for her and she latched both hands onto each side of the plastic bowl, she lifted it up and started to tilt it so that it would land on her head. With a few bits of food already falling out she quickly pushed it down and felt the bowls contents leave and fall down onto her forehead.

The food soon dropped out and landed all over Sunset just the way she wanted it to with a loud splat. The warm gooey cheese soon dripped down from her hair and landed onto her bib and backside and continued to drip further down onto the seat. Sunset looked over at Pound Cake who began to laugh and clap his hands at the sight of Sunset covered in food.

"Gha-ba-ba!" Pound Cake roared in laughter, he jumped back and forth in his high chair seat unable to contain his laughter at the other baby.

The laughing caught the attention of Pinkie Pie and Twilight who, finished their conversation the moment Pound Cake began to laugh.

"See! Pound Cake is happy that you're going to feed him." Pinkie Pie smiled at the baby.

Twilight turned around to see what all the commotion was and immediately noticed Sunset Shimmer covered in mac and cheese from head to diaper.

"SUNSET!" Twilight screamed at her little baby girl. "What have you done!?" She leaned back in horror at the sight and placed the hands on her forehead.

Sunset didn't expect that reaction, her big smile suddenly dwindled into nothingness as Twilight quickly rushed over with a paper towel to wipe the food off her. Why wasn't she happy? Why wasn't she laughing like Pinkie Pie? It made no sense. And to make matters worse the paper towels that were quickly wiped across her bare skin made her feel very uncomfortable.

Tears began to swell around Sunset's eyes. Her groans of pain and confusion began to get louder and louder until she broke down in tears with her arms and legs violently kicking up against Twilight's big strong hands.
1221311112112121112211122211121112111211.title: She dumped the mac and cheese on her forehead.

"I'm telling you guys Sunset is crazy! We have to do something about it" Rainbow yelled in their band practice room

Pinkie squealed with delight, "OO I like.."

123111.content:
A day pasted and by midafternoon, Sunset Shimmer was knocking on Rarity's house door. It was a little chilly with the quiet sound of faint breezes. No one was outside, except Sunset. She was wearing jeans with a purple's sweatshirt, and hoping to spend the day with her friends. She wanted to redeem herself but she didn't want to turn down an offer with her only friends.

Sunset didn't have much time to think, because Rarity opened the door within less than a minute. Sunset politely greeted Rarity, "Hey Rarity, thanks for inviting me over."

"No problem Sunset, we're friends after all. Now, come on. You just have to hear our new song."

Sunset faintly smiled, as her friend quietly brought her to the garage.

The rest of the gang said "hi" to Sunset Shimmer, but the room was un-normally quiet. Only a few comments would be said between them. Not to mention, things seemed overly structured to Sunset. She didn't say anything, thinking it had to do with the song. Not long after Sunset sat down, the humane5 started to play.

Rainbow Dash started singing "Rock-a-Bye" over and over again, and one by one, someone else would join in

RD: Rock-a-Bye
Pinkie: Rock-a-Bye
Fluttershy: Rock-a-Bye
AJ: Rock-a-Bye
Rarity-Rock-a-Bye

Rarity then took over, singing "Our Baaaay-Be Sunset"

All of them then sung in unison, "Iiiin the Treetop! When the wind blows, when the wind blows, the craaay-dle.. will drop!

Sunset was confused about the song, but didn't quiet notice the subtle changes happening to her body. By the time they said "will drop!" Sunset actually had lost seven years. Her jeans were looser around the waist, and her sleeves were too long for her arms. Her face started looking younger and younger, and her hair was mysteriously shortening.

Rarity sung a solo line again "Oh Sunset... when the bough breaks!" followed by all of them singing "Your craaay-dle... will fall!"

Off of just those lines, Sunset lost another 5 years. As a five year old in 17 year old clothing, her clothes consumed her. Her little feet didn't even meet half way in the jeans and her panties were incredibly loose. If one was to pick her up, both articles of clothing could easily slip off, leaving the little girl's bottom naked. The sweatshirt was relatively huge, too heavy to even lift the sleeves. At one point, in the song, she finally felt something off about her clothes and looked down in horror. Whats happening to me?! she thought. She started to silently tear up. She prevented herself from crying a lot, because she was a big girl and big girls no cry

In final unison, they all sang loudly "And down, down, down, will come our baby Sunset! Cradle and All!"

By the end of the song, Sunset had reached the tender age of 1. She could still talk, but her voice was high pitched and many words were hard to pronounce. By the end of the song, Sunset had also lost all psychological barriers, wailing like the baby she was. The sweatshirt covered her entire body, and the panties were almost falling off.

AJ and Rainbow Dash didn't look at Sunset. The whole plan seemed kinda messed up to them. Fluttershy, Pinkie, and Rarity on the other hand crowded around little Sunset.

Rarity was the first to say! "D'awwwww, its okay little Sunset. Your big girl friends are here." Sunset ignored Rarity, until Rarity picked her up. Sunset's pants and panties fell, allowing a faint breeze to pass through her chubby legs. Then Rarity held her in one arm and removed Sunset's sweatshirt, shirt underneath, and bra.

Sunset covered her eyes, with tears coming out. She had never felt more mortified. While Rarity rocked her back and forth, Fluttershy and Pinkie were showering her with compliments, like "You're so adorable!"

Sunset was going to continue to cry, but something distracted her; it was a PACIFIER! Rarity pulled out a purple pacifier with a red loop, and gently shoved it into Sunset's mouth. Sunset couldn't help but enjoy the taste, but she closed her eyes. This wasn't what she had in mind today!
123111.title: Fast forward to lullaby regression

choices: Sunset wakes up from a nightmare
1231111.content:
Before the humane5 left, Rarity gave Sunset a diaper changing. She wanted her little baby waby to wave to her guests.

"Follow me girls, Little Sunset needs a changy wangy" Rarity exclaimed

Fluttershy and Pinkie followed, right behind Rarity. AJ and RD kept a distance, this still was pretty weird for them.

They came into a room that was sun themed. The carpet was a light orange. There were baby toys in a big box in the corner, though some were spread across the ground. A shelf full of baby books and a rocking chair were nearby, followed by a red stroller that read on the handle "Sunset Shimmer." In the far back was a polished wooden crib, with a red mattress and orange covers and pillows. Nearby was changing table, dresser, and closet. The closet had spare baby necessities and the dresser was fully of miniature versions of Sunset's clothing. As for the changing table, it was also red with a soft orange surface. There were plenty of diapers stacked in the changing table, along with baby powder, lotion, and wipes.

Pinkie shouted with glee "WOW! Rarity, you really went all out!"

"Well, of course I did. My little Sunset deserves the best treatment, and the best fashion!" Rarity responded joyfully.

"Now, somebody needs a diaper"

Sunset peaked out the corner of one of her hands, frightened by what she saw. Tears came down her face, as Rarity placed her on the changing table. Rarity was quick though, raising Sunset's chubby legs and powdering her butt thoroughly. She then slid a diaper underneath, and strapped the white cushion into place.

"That's not it my darling!" Rarity then pulled out a miniature version of Sunset's purple shirt and orange skirt, and dressed Sunset up. "Now, isn't she just adorable."

All of them gushed, and soon it was just Rarity and Sunset. As they left, Rarity held Sunset in one arm, moving her chubby right hand to wave good bye.

Then Rarity brought Sunset back to the baby room, and finally removed the pacifier. Sunset instantly cried after it was removed, "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!"

"Oh, there there.. Mama Rarity is here."

"Waaa Waaa Why ya-you 'sobs' wegwes me?!"

"Because you've been driving yourself crazy trying to be redeemed. It was never going to happen unless you're image changes. No one can be mean to a baby."

"Bu-bu-but I no wanna be babwy."

"D'awwwwww, you'll love it soon, don't you worry."

"No, I won-ta! Me bi girw! Me bi- giiiii WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!"

"There, there" Rarity started rocking her back and forth, singing hush little baby don't you cry"

Sunset soon drifted off to sleep, but the day was young. In a couple hours, she'd be waken up and face her new life once again.
1231111.title: Rarity takes care of Sunset all afternoon, the ...

choices: The plan goes off without a hitch, and everybody forgives Sunset
Sunset is forgiven, but she has an accident.
12311112.content:
Wrapped in her little orange blanket, Sunset had one of the best dreams ever. She dreamed that the school had forgiven her, and that she was the leader of several school projects. In this dream, everybody looked up to her and she had tons of autonomy.

This was a stark contrast to the real world, and within three hours she'd soon re-realize her fate. At around 11:00 o'clock, the sun started to come out and the clouds dispersed. Small rays of light passed through Sunset's room window. Sunset was already waking up though. She had a faint sleepy smile on her face as she woke up, but slowly realized her scenario. If things we're bad enough, she felt warm and wet around her crotch. She tucked her head underneath the covers, looking at her butt. She saw her normal dress, but there was white bulge at the bottom. Curious, she lifted it up to find, a DIAPER! It wasn't just any diaper, it was a wet diaper. She immediately started crying "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA DIS A-ta HAPWENIN!!"

Rarity heard Sunset's cries on the baby monitor, and quickly came up. "Hello my little darling, how'd you sleep?"

Sunset paused for a second and then went back to crying.

Rarity was very calm, "Awww, there, there. Let's see what's bothering you." She carefully reached down, and picked up Sunset from her arms. She then rested Sunset on her chest with one arm, checking Sunset's diaper with the other; she carefully stretched the diaper elastic seeing yellow stains. "That's all. Haha, don't worry Mama Rarity can fix you up."

Rarity walked Sunset over to the changing table, gently laying her on the soft surface. "Now, this shouldn't take long." She removed Sunset's mini skirt and unstrapped the diaper. In a streamless action, she lifted Sunset's legs and slid the diaper away. "Time for the baby wipes!" Rarity gracefully rubbed Sunset's butt, almost giving a mini massage. Sunset didn't want to admit that this felt great. Before Sunset knew it, Rarity was tapping the baby powder, and sliding a new diaper in place. Sunset cooed as the new diaper was finally strapped in.

As Rarity dressed Sunset with the mini skirt, she asked "So, How was your dream Sunset?"

Sunset hesitated, but tried getting out the words "G-good. Stuudwen forgwive me iin it."

"Oh, thats marvelous. Well, don't you worry that will happen very soon now that your a baby."

Sunset quietly teared up, "Wh-why am I wike dis?"

"Awww, you don't remember. Its part of a school program. You signed up, thinking it would change your image. I was listed as your caretaker, and you came to my house later this morning."

"I-I dwid?"

"Yep! And I'm so happy you did. You and I can do so many fun things today."

"Haa-how wong it gonwa wast?"

"I don't know. The experiment didn't specify."

Sunset looked down, scared of what to come.

She was interrupted though, by Rarity. She picked up Sunset, holding her firmly in her arms. "Don't you worry. This can be fun. For instance, here's a bottle. Can you say that Bot-tle?"

Sunset adorably said "Baa baa"

Rarity patronized her "Very good. Now, drink up. Its nice and warm."

Like the pacifier, Rarity shoved a warm bottle of formula into Sunset's mouth and Sunset suckled on it.

"Good girl" Rarity said. She slowly walked over to the reading chair, holding Sunset's bottle steadily. In the chair, Rarity rocked Sunset back in forth while holding the bottle in her mouth.

Sunset soon finished, and Rarity asked "Would you like to go outside now? The cafe is nearby and having you become redeemed was sorta the idea of regressing you."

Fear suddenly surged over Sunset, and Rarity could tell. "Of course, we don't have to."

This made Sunset's fear partially vanish. She was still her, and she wasn't going to let anything, even being a baby, get in her way. "No, me act-twy wan ta go. I gotta be wedeemed."

"Ok, then. Let's show the world the new you!" Rarity stood up, and moved to Sunset's red stroller. She placed Sunset in the comfy interior, with a stuffed doggy. She strapped her in place, and took her out. "They're going to love you!"
12311112.title: Sunset has a nice morning

choices: Rarity cheers Sunset up during the changing
Sunset is lost in fear during the changing
123111122.content:
Rarity collected a red baby bag, with many baby necessities, such as spare diapers, bottles, blankets, and pacifiers. "Alright, Sunset here comes the train ride. Choo Choo!"

Rarity started pushing the cart slowly, which still scared Sunset. She feared she smash into something, not trusting Rarity completely. Before they left the house, Sunset yelped "Staahp!"

Rarity came over, kneeling down in front of Sunset. "Whats the matter sweetie?"

Sunset hesitated to get out the words "i-its scawwy. I cud cwass."

Rarity giggled a little at the idea. "No, its alright Sunset. You're ok. I want to give you something though to help."

Sunset tilted her head adorably "wut?"

Rarity didn't respond, instead she took Sunset out of the seat. The sudden abruptness scared Sunset, and she was worried that she asked the wrong question. "Don hur me, I sowwy!"

Rarity still respond, but did something even better; she hugged Sunset. Rarity's hug was a nice and firm, pressing Sunset into her chest and providing warmth. Sunset quickly calmed down, closing her eyes and smiling. Sunset was completely subdued. Rarity slowly rotated back and forth and Sunset adorably cooed in response. After about 3 minutes of hugging, Rarity put Sunset back in the stroller, with the stuffed doggy. "How do you feel now?"

Sunset smiled "Betta, tanks mama Warity"

"Now if you ever get scared, just remember I'm here. You can even hug your doggy for comfort. If you really need my help, I'll come by to give you a hug."

"H-ha-how wil you knowa?"

"Awww, Darling. I just do. Its a unique skill that all mommies have."

Sunset liked this answer and responded, "tanks mama..."

Rarity gently pushed the cart, and Sunset adjusted by hugging her doggy. Rarity gradually pushed the cart to normal speed, while quietly singing "la di da li la"

Eventually, they reached the sidewalk near the stores. Things were still pretty quiet, but several adults were walking by. None of them recognized Sunset and several of them waved to Sunset on their walk.

When they were still about a block away from the cafe, one adult stopped them to meet Sunset. She looked to be in her late 30's, wearing a white blouse with stylish black pants and boots. Her skin was tan, her hair was orange, and her eyes redish orange.

She just came out of a beauty saloon, and saw Rarity and Sunset to her left. She immediately paused after seeing Sunset Shimmer, and then shouted, making quite a public scene "Oh! She's ADORABLE!" She jogged the little distance to Rarity and Sunset.

Sunset was starting to have second doubts about leaving the house. This lady seemed enormous, and her loud voice didn't make things any better. Rarity smiled, "You have company little Sunset. Don't worry, this will be fun."

The lady came over quickly, "Hi there, I'm sorry. I noticed your baby and I just had to come over!"

Rarity smiled, giving a very laid back reply "Oh, I totally understand. My little Sunset is quite the sight isn't she."

"Awwww, that's an adorable name. Can I say meet the little angel?"

Sunset Shimmer was currently hiding behind her doggy.

"Maybe. Sorry, she's a little shy towards adults." Rarity then knelt down to Sunset's level, "Sunset, would you like to meet this nice lady?"

"Nu uh.." Sunset then tilted her head.

"Would you be willing if mommy held you?"

Sunset paused and then said "maywe"

"Aww, could girl. Mommy is very proud of you." Rarity reached down to hold Sunset. She picked her up and pressed her firmly into her bosom.

Sunset looked up at Rarity and the lady. Both staring down at her. Sunset looked up confused and somewhat scared. What was this lady going to do to her?

She tickled her chest. "Awww, she's cuter than I thought."

Rarity responded for Sunset "Oh, thank you. She is, isn't she?"

"Absolutely. I have to ask then, how'd you become her mother? You look so young yourself."

Rarity paused for a second and then responded "Well, I uh.. I'm her foster mother. I met her through the school at the orphanage. She looked like she needed a mother in her life, and after a long talk with my parents, I decided to adopt her."

"Awww, that's so sweet." The lady then poked Sunset's nose "You look like you're in good hands little one." Several more minutes of her playing with Sunset, until Rarity interjected.

"We, do sorta have to get on our way."

"Oh, I totally understand. Thank you for letting me play with her. You be good now Sunset." She then waved and passed off.

As Rarity strapped Sunset back in, "You were very polite thank you for it."

Sunset blushed "Tanks. Da sabe wa ah gud one?"

Rarity smiled, "Thank you. You know, your such a nice baby. You know that."

Sunset cooed in response and they were on their way. Within 7 minutes they were already at the cafe. Time for the test.

Rarity opened the door, pulling it outward and pushing Sunset through the door first. Luckily, only so many people were in the cafe at that time. It was just 6 girls from multiple different cliques.
Here are the girls:
Naomi http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130...
Mystery Mint http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130...
Aqua Blossom http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130...
Paisley http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130...
Cloud Kicker http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130...
Apple Fritter http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130...

Rarity came over to where girls were chatting and said "Um.. Hi. Do any of you have a sec?"

Cloud Kicker was the first to respond "Yeah, come over Rarity. And whose the cute baby in the crib?"

Rarity came closer, enabling to actually see Sunset Shimmer. None of them responded. They were all just dumb struck.

Naomi cut in "Don't tell me that's... that's Sunset Shimmer?"

Rarity nervously replied "Why yes? I actually came over for specifically this reason."

There was a unanimous "WHAT?!" from their classmates

While Rarity struggled to form the words. Sunset hid behind her stuffed doggy. She feared they'd do something to her. Thanks to her fear, everything was muffled. She had no idea what any of the big girls were saying.

"Y-yes.. See, its pretty tricky to explain. It has to do with that magic stuff that Twilight brought here. An accident."

Mystery Mint scoffed "serves her right." The rest of them nodded

Rarity took a deep breath. This was the first time she was defending Sunset Shimmer, and she was scared it'd ruin her reputation. "Hey now! I understand that she caused all of you grief, myself included. But, that was the past. She's not the same person anymore. Look at her." Rarity then pointed to Sunset. "She's just a scared baby, can't you look past her mistakes?! That's the whole reason I came over."

The six girls looked between each other, confused on how to act. While they were distracted, Rarity gently pulled out Sunset Shimmer, holding her firmly. Sunset looked scared and she hid her eyes. Sunset's head not facing them. "Its alright, don't worry Sunset. They'll forgive you."

"See girls, look what you've done."

Each girl looked guilt stricken, and soon, one by one they cracked. First Paisley, then Apple Fritter, Naomi, Aqua Blossom, Cloud Kicker, and lastly Mystery Mint.

Paisley said "There, there. I forgive you. I know you feel sorry, and, in truth, thats all that matters." She pat Sunset's back.

Apple Fritter "She's right. The past is the past."

Naomi "Yeah, I agree.."

Aqua Blossom "I suppose, she's right."

Cloud Kicker "I hated the old Sunset Shimmer. But, shes.. just a baby now. I can't stay angry at her."

Mystery Mint grumbled "Augh, fine. I forgive her too."

Each one pat Sunset's back, eventually causing to perk up. Rarity turned Sunset around, "See Sunset, I told you."

"T-tank youa.."

All five girls then, showered her with compliments and baby talk. "Awwwww, soo cute."
"You might just be the cutest baby I ever met."
"Coochi coochi coo"
"What an adorable baby waby"
"Haha, you're ticklish little gem"
"Good girl, such a cute baby."

Sunset truly was taking in all the praise, and she was the happiest she'd been in months. She relaxed, intentionally pooping in her diaper. It came out with a big fart noise. The praise was suddenly interrupted in both sound and smell.

"Ewww gross! Did she just poop?!"
"I think she did, it smells terrible."
"Rarity, please tell me you packed some spare diapers."

Everything, her entire redemption, changed like that because of a simple bowl movement. Sunset Shimmer quickly started to tear up as they commentated on it, and finally wailed at the mention of "diapers."

"WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!"

Rarity yelled "YES! ONE MINUTE!"

She grabbed the baby back, and carefully moved Sunset into the bathroom. Luckily there was a changing station.
123111122.title: Sunset is forgiven, but she has an accident.

choices: Sunset wakes up, still at the diner.
Sunset wakes up, being strolled to the school.
1231111222.content:
Whimpering, Sunset was set onto the fairly cold changing table.

Rarity understood her daughter was not too thrilled to be in a dirty diaper right now. So many people around to comment. Very embarrassing.

So, she hurried along more than normal.

Undid the tapes, Rarity lifted Sunset's legs up.

Sunset began to cry as the wipes were used, hating the sensation.

Rarity cooed, "You're okay, baby. You're okay."

Soon enough, the wipes and dirty diaper were thrown away with one hand. The other still held Sunset's feet.

Slipping the fresh diaper under Sunset's bum, Rarity could now finish the whole process off with a hefty amount of baby powder.

Diaper pulled over, Sunset heard the noise of tapes being stuck on her cloth's sides.

Rarity deposited every supply back into the bag, and brought her baby up into her arms again.

She snuggled her sweet-smelling child, saying, "Oh, aw! See Sunny? Diaper changes not so bad, are they?"

Sunset didn't bother replying, too relaxed by her mother's steady bouncing her up/down. The warmth also assisted in keeping her calm.

Rarity slowed unlatched Sunset's grip on her, so the baby could be put back in her stroller.

Buckling her up once more, Rarity strolled out into the eating area again.

The girls from before had made room for the mother and child. Rarity didn't expect that to happen, but went along.

Wheeling the stroller over, she released Sunset from the protection. Sitting down, Rarity pulled sent into her lap.

Mystery Mint commented with worry, "Is Sunset...going to...go again for some time? 'Cause I don't want to be eating, then have to smell-"

Rarity rolled her eyes, "Since you asked, she's fine for right now. Will take a bit before she needs another diaper. Honestly though, it would be more uncomfortable for her to sit in it than your nose to smell. Please, leave any talk of her going potty out of the conversation for right now. I don't want her getting upset."

"Hey, just asking."

"Well, kindly, don't."

Mystery Mint shrugged, seeing the mother's aggressive side take hold at the thought of getting Sunset crying again when it could be avoided.

Paisley decided to start an entirely different discussion, to cool off the anger that began steaming off Rarity, "Sooo...did you want us to wave the waitress over? We had ordered before you two even came. I'm sure the cook can get a couple more orders in with the rest of our own."

Rarity said with a grin, "Why not? Though, Sunset can't eat the food here. Her teeth haven't even grown in yet. Still on the bottle, you know."

"Ah. Well, I'll just get her attention, then."

Paisley tried to wave calmly, at first. Yet, when two minutes went by, her arm started to hurt from being in the air for so long.

She groaned, "Ugh! Sick of this! Goin' in, gals! Wish me luck."

Then, got up from the table, and literally marched into the kitchen herself.

Naomi said in fright, "I hope she'll be okay. I would hate for her to get thrown out. That's why we don't go to the computer room anymore..."

Mystery spoke with a sigh, "Don't forget the restaurant that opened up a few weeks back. And, the lost-and-found table. ...The boys' locker room, too. Though...we weren't supposed to be in there in the first place, anyways."

Cloud decided to intervene on the yelling in the kitchen before things got out of hand, "Be back soon. I swear that girl's more trouble than a school bully sometimes."

And, left to deal with her friend.

Apple Fritter was wondering something, asking, "Rarity...does Sunset think being a baby's...fun? I mean, it...doesn't sound horrible. Kinda...a sweet deal, actually. My opinion on the whole thing."

...

Mystery, Naomi, and Aqua gave the girl a confused stare each, to which she said in defense, "What?! Sounds cool. Naps whenever, playing with toys whenever, everyone calls you compliments! I even heard babies have better senses, so...maybe a common bottle of milk tastes ten times better! ...And, a diaper feels basically just like a pillow, I'd bet."

Even more confused stares.

She glared at them, "It's not weird to wonder! You all need to be more open to other points of view!"

Still staring.

She said with a crossing of the arms, "Whatever."

Rarity giggled, responding, "Apple, dear, I wouldn't know about that. You're free to ask Sunny in a few days though. Don't try right now. She needs to get better adjusted to her new age."

Cloud now brought a mad Paisley on her return to the table, with the captured girl frowning.

The girls switched spots at the request of Cloud, saying Paisley isn't allowed on the end anymore.

Grumbling, she agreed.

After a few minutes, the food was brought out, with the waitress giving Paisley her's last.

Rarity asked the woman what the bill would be for her own meal, which the worker said, "No charge. Your...friend's very persuasive."

Paisley grinned, winking at Rarity.

Rarity had been given a cucumber sandwhich, with olive oil dressing on the side.

She wouldn't dine until her little one had her fill though.

Pulling out a pre-made bottle, she lifted Sunset with her chest and arm as support.

Sunset was surprised by how thirsty she had been. Her arms attempting to snatch the bottle away, so she could down it as fast as possible.

Aqua grabbed Rarity's attention, ceasing the descent of the bottle into Sunset's mouth.

The girl blushed, asking, "...Can I feed her? I...would really like to."

Rarity saw no issue, so passed the baby off until she reached Aqua's awaiting arms.

The bottle was handed over, and Aqua immediately began to feed the child.

Sunset stared up at Aqua while drinking, not really paying much attention to her aside from the deep smile the girl showed.

Aqua said softly, "You're so cute. Wittle baby loves her milky-wilky. Yes, she does. I'm sure she does."

She continued breathing out soothing words, which added to the sleepy effect the bottle had on Sunset.

The milk did taste delicious. So, so tasty. A little bit of sugar had been poured in before, giving the milk a kick of sweetness.

Her eyes slowly closed. Her suckles on the bottle slowed.

Sunset was soon uanable to stay asleep with everything nice going on around her.

choices: Sunset regresses in her sleep due to the baby bottle
Sweetie gives Sunset a diaper change
1241.content:
With Rarity out of town for the week, Sunset asked if she could help out with some of Rarity's designs. To many peoples' surprise, Sunset actually had an eye for detail and design. She came up with good ideas in the past, so Rarity was more than happy to receive her help. Rarity gave Sunset a key to the house and early Sunday morning Sunset went over to Rarity's house with a medium sized sleepover bag.

Little did Sunset Shimmer realize though that a surprise awaited her at Rarity's house. When Sunset opened the door, Sweetie Belle and her two crusader friends were there.

Sweetie Belle happily greeted Sunset with her friends behind her "Hi Sunset Shimmer. My sister asked me if I could help you help her."

Sunset was a little surprised, but kept her cool "Um.. sure, I don't mind."

Sweetie quickly asked "So, would you like a drink?"

"Yes please. Whatever you have is fine."

"Sweet! I'll make you some hot coco then. Rarity's room is upstairs second room on the right."

"Thank you."

Each went about their business. Sweetie Belle and the crusaders went to the kitchen, while Sunset went upstairs. About 10 minutes past before Sweetie brought Sunset the hot coco.

"Here you are Sunset. Tell me what you think."

Sunset was just brainstorming when Sweetie Belle came in and said "Thanks Sweetie Belle." Sunset then took a sip and the coco was just right. "Aww, that tastes good. Thanks Crusaders."

The three crusaders said in unison. "No problem, want anything else?"

Sunset shrugged "Not really. I guess you could just stay here so I have someone to bounce ideas off of."

Sweetie "Sounds great!"

Sunset was a little disturbed. Sweetie Bloom was taking what was an easy task to be crucially important. 'Oh well" Sunset thought "it doesn't harm anyone." For the next two hours, Sunset Shimmer came up with ideas, occasionally asking for feedback. It was rather boring for Crusaders' though. They wanted to do something for Sunset that was more.. active.

Just then Sweetie Belle spotted the perfect opportunity to help. Sunset yawned "aaAAAaah," which prompted a series of questions from Sweetie.

She perked up "Are you tired Sunset? If you are tired, don't hesitate to rest. We have a guest bedroom and everything."

Sunset wasn't really paying attention though "Huh, what did you say Sweetie?"

Sweetie sighed "I said "Are you tired Sunset?" And the answer is obvious, you are. So, follow me to the living room."

Sunset was surprised. Sweetie Belle's response came out of no where and was unnecessarily authoritarian in tone. It almost felt like Sweetie was talking down to her. Sunset didn't know how to respond though. Normally she'd give a strong "no," but this was Rarity's little sister. As a result, Sunset's response came out pretty timid. Fluttershy levels of timid. "B-But.. I'm fine.."

Sweetie gave an assertive motherly response "No your not! Come with me, your going to bed."

Before Sunset knew it Sweetie was holding her arm and walking her to the living room. Scootaloo and Applebloom just looked at each other with annoyed expressions. Sweetie was at it again, being as overbearing as can be. Scootaloo and Applebloom just followed them silently.

Within a minute, Sweetie Belle and Sunset Shimmer were in the living room. Sweetie sat on the couch and motioned Sunset to the same couch. Sunset nervously laid on the couch, resting her head on Sweetie Belle. Sweetie then rubbed her sides. Next thing Sunset knew, Sweetie Belle was singing a lullaby. "Rock-a-bye baby in the treetop..." Strangely though Sunset fell asleep.

Sweetie then quietly demanded Applebloom get a blanket and Scootaloo a baby bottle. Sunset was now helpless and Sweetie was going to take full advantage of that. Sweetie was no longer a helper, she was a babysitter."
1241.title: Sunset Shimmer, getting help or becoming helpless

12411.content:
Sunset awoke, feeling...off.

Maybe it had something to do with her body no longer hanging slightly off the couch.

Maybe it had to deal with the fact she wasn't even on the couch now.

Perhaps, the main reason was another human being was holding her!

Sunset stared up in shock at...Sweetie Belle.

Tried to, honestly.

Kind of hard to make expressions with a damn pacifier in your mouth.

Her eyes gave away what she was thinking though.

Sweetie glanced downwards after feeling the baby get much more active.

Then, said the most horrifying sentence to say right now, "Oh! Sunset, you're awake! Babysitting's so boring if the baby sleeps through everything!"

What?! Ba...by?

Well...that'd explain the pacifier and smaller size.

Sure, surprise should be much higher in level for Sunset. Though, she's learned to be open-minded to all kinds of things here. Starting with magic transferring to this world to be used for good and evil.

Or, whatever reason Sweetie had to return Sunset to a baby.

Still, being open-minded didn't mean confusion was to be just thrown out the window.

Sunset began to whimper, not understanding why age regression had taken place.

Sweetie giggled, seemingly reading her mind, "Little one, it's okay. You'll be in good hands. By that, I mean mine. And, the other girls. When they get back with the supplies."

Then, peeked into the blanket's front, then the back.

After her checking was done, she placed Sunset against her shoulder, bouncing the baby lightly.

She said in relief, "Glad you haven't...'went' yet. I don't have any diapers."

Sunset blushed, realizing Sweetie just peeked into the blanket, which apparently was the only clothing keeping Sunset from being naked, to check for accidents.

Then,

info.brief_description: Focus on The Equestria Girls in a series of Age Regression scenarios.
info.description:
Welcome to Equestria Girls: Age Regression.

Rules:

1). No Death.
2). No Sexual Content
3). When making a choice, do not branch it off into other choices unless you are at the start of a story.
4). A story may only end if there has been 20 or more contributions towards it.
5). Before submitting a new chapter, please review your work and correct any spelling and grammar errors.

This story is regularly quality-controlled so if there is a chapter that doesn't meet the rules then it will be deleted and the author will be noted.

Equestria Girls is a spin-off movie based on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic where the shows main character Twilight Sparkle goes through a mirror to recover a missing crowd which has been stolen by a thief by the name of Sunset Shimmer. As she travels through the mirror she turns into a Human with her best friend Spike who is turned into a Dog. In this world she meets alternate versions of her friends who are also humans and they help her recover the crown from Sunset Shimmer.

Note: For those who haven't seen Equestria Girls may be warned that possible spoilers could be found in this interactive story.
